name: dodge-bomb
description:
--theme explanation--

the player never stops moving and will eventually wrap around the screen (there and back), there are also coins (the collectable).

--description--

this is dodge-bomb, you run around and grab coins while dodging the bombs, its pretty much as simple as that.

--controls--

hold the up and down arrows to move up and down (I know, revolutionary) 

--creators-- 

Andrew (Me)
